剪.definition: (bound form) scissors or similar tool; to cut as with scissors; (bound form) to wipe out; to exterminate; to edit (video, audio etc)

剪刀差.definition: prices scissor (caught between low income and high prices)

剪切.definition: to cut (with scissors or similar tool); to shear; (geology) shear; (computing) to cut (as in "cut-and-paste")

剪嘴鷗.definition: (bird species of China) Indian skimmer (Rynchops albicollis)

剪彩.definition: to cut the ribbon (at a launching or opening ceremony)

剪徑.definition: to waylay and rob; highway robbery

剪掉.definition: to cut off; to cut away; to trim

剪接.definition: to edit (raw footage: film, video, audio etc); (genetics) to splice

剪映.definition: CapCut, a short-form video editing app developed by ByteDance 字節跳動|字节跳动[Zi4jie2 Tiao4dong4]

剪片.definition: to edit a film or video

剪紙.definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art); to make paper cutouts

剪綵.definition: to cut the ribbon (at an opening)

剪草除根.definition: lit. cut grass and pull out roots (idiom); fig. to destroy root and branch; to eradicate

剪輯.definition: to edit (raw footage: film, video, audio etc); edited version

剪頭.definition: to get a haircut; to give sb a haircut
